Posts.Content: tchamber wrote: I am very new to this website and very glad that I have found it.  It really helps answer questions as the answers are coming from other women that have been down the same road.  I had a single mastectomy which also included 9 lymph nodes removed on Dec 7, 2010.  The drain tube in my chest was removed 7 days after surgery and after the removed I noticed increased swelling and the area being hard.  The drain tube from the armpit was removed 14 days after surgery, again increasing swelling and area being hard.  I don't see my doc until tomorrow and my 6 six week surgery follow up isn't until January 27.  I have been trying to excerise my arm as many people have said make sure you get the arm moving, but I am wondering if I have over done it.  My treatment has been different in means I received 8 chemo treatments first then surgery and now radation.  I am hoping to hear back that the discomfort I am experiencing is normal and apart of the healing process.  I would truly appreciate any replies and/or advice anyone may have. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Tightness/Swelling After Mastectomy & 9 Nodes Removed tchamber jessamine
